name: extendscript-starter
description: Starter project for extendscript-bundler, uses livereload and has a "poor mans redux"

scripts.test: tsc -p src/AfterEffects/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/Audition/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/Illustrator/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/InDesign/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/Photoshop/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/Premiere/tsconfig.json; tsc -p src/ScriptUI/tsconfig.json

author: Koen Schmeets
